name: Sacricent
description:
Sacricent is a game about a centipede like creature who eats his own legs to gain health.

You can also steal the enemies' legs to regain your lost legs.

Arrow keys or AWD to walk left/right and jump.

IMPORTANT: Space bar to eat a leg to gain health.

The fewer legs you have, the slower you walk and jump.

Left Control to shoot.

This is the Ludum Dare entry. So it doesn't have sound, the final boss is also a bit too hard, and might need a less fair method to defeat.
